name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Donald E. MYERS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Donald E. MYERS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Philadelphia, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
440 A.2d 1189
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Donald E. MYERS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 19, 1982.
Decided Feb. 19, 1982.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Garrold Tennis, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
